name: High Engagement Post
text: 🎉 Amazing new product launch! This is absolutely incredible and I love it so much! Check out the beautiful design and fantastic features! #amazing #love #newproduct #excited 🚀✨

name: Negative Sentiment Post
text: This is terrible! I hate this product so much. Worst experience ever! Very disappointed and frustrated. Would not recommend to anyone. 😡

name: Technical Content
text: Implementing machine learning algorithms for multimodal content analysis requires sophisticated feature extraction pipelines and robust model architectures. Our approach leverages CLIP embeddings for text-image alignment and TF-IDF vectorization for keyword extraction.

name: Social Media Optimized
text: Just had the best coffee ever! ☕️ Perfect start to Monday morning! Thanks @coffeeshop for the amazing service! #MondayMotivation #CoffeeLovers #GoodVibes 🌟
